attributes.action: lose god save the queen as itnis unpatriotic to england and replace with the patriotic english national anthem "Jerusalem"
attributes.additional_details: We the people of england demand that the government gets rid of the unpatriotic hymn of god save the queen and replace it jerusalem which is more patriotically based for england,if wales and scotland and indeed every country in the world have their own national anthem ,the by god so should england . On behalf of all the english I say to government "MAKE IT SO"
